vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Ἡρῳδίων (Rec. Ἡρω-), -ωνος, ὁ
Herodion: Rom.16:11.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the New Testament, only mentioned at Rom.16.11
§ Herodion
Herodian, (Proper name), Rom. 16:11*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
希羅天 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "英勇的"
一個基督徒 (羅 16:11)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
希罗天 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "英勇的"
一个基督徒 (罗 16:11)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: Hê-rô-đi-ôn. người cơ đốc nhân ở Rô-ma.
